data.text: @ahandvanish @nytimes Wow I've been wondering who would pull that together. Next they need to add MIS-C and how about Permanently Disabled too.
@ahandvanish @nytimes I thought it would be stats. It just sends me to their article that is behind a pay wall. 😭... It should be a stat next to deaths and  infections.
@ahandvanish @nytimes Hanna, muchas gracias por tu trabajo. El colectivo Covid Persistente México, te manda un abrazo fuerte 💖✨🙏🏽

@ahandvanish @nytimes Wow. I feel like the tide may finally be turning in acknowledging long Covid in the media. (Of course, sadly there will be even more first hand accounts over the next year as so many millions more were exposed during omicron).
@ahandvanish @nytimes After two years of the pandemic, it was high time but better late than never.
@ahandvanish @nytimes You can put blame on the bored and attention seeking who have diluted actual long Covid with their whining about depression, fatigue, and “stuff still smells weird”
@ahandvanish @nytimes The Times has to tread a fine line. On the one hand there are powerful interests that want to sweep Long Covid under the rug, and on the other hand they can’t ignore it.
